DOC.brief_summary: This study compare tolerability different method switch another medication duloxetine management diabetic nerve pain . The primary objective compare gradual method abrupt method , see different tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability Switching Duloxetine Management Diabetic Nerve Pain
DOC.criteria: You must diagnose Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain . You must take dose amitriptyline daily bedtime least four ( 4 ) week . You must stable glycemic control . You must able visit doctor 's office week ten ( 10 ) week . You acute recovery phase follow myocardial infarction . You Major Depressive Disorder , Anxiety Disorder , psychiatric illness doctor ask . You allergic amitriptyline duloxetine . You currently take anticonvulsant , cisapride ( Propulsid ) , take opioid three consecutive day 14 day prior Visit 2 . You uncontrolled narrow angle glaucoma .
